game.description: A mysterious dark force has taken over the land, and your job is to find out and neutralize the source.
game.objective: Investigate the source of the dark force and neutralize it.

tasks.description: Venture through the haunting Dark Forest and reach the ominous Dark Tower.
Solve the riddles of the dark spirits to enter the Dark Tower.
Defeat the shadow beast residing in the Dark Tower.

game.title: Shadows of the Dark Tower
